Presentation

Class InvoiceUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • Presentation.InvoiceUI

  • public class InvoiceUI
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements the boundary Invoice UI to interact with the user.
    Since:
    6th November 2014

    1.0
    Author:

    • Constructor Detail

      • InvoiceUI

        public InvoiceUI()

    • Method Detail

      • printOrderInvoice

        public static void printOrderInvoice()
        This function display a list of orders for the user to select from to print the order. Before printing, user would be ask to select a choice of discount the customer has and update the order. Once the order invoice is printed, the order is set to close and the table is now vacant.

      • printSaleRevenueReportByDay

        public static void printSaleRevenueReportByDay()
        This function ask user to input a certain day. Then prints out a list of order invoice with complete breakdown of ordered items and packages and total revenue of that day.

      • printSaleRevenueReportByMonth

        public static void printSaleRevenueReportByMonth()
        This function ask user to input a certain month. Then prints out the top & least amount sales and total revenue of that day. Then prints out the total revenue of that month.
